NetBase

Class MessageParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • NetBase.MessageParser

  • public class MessageParser
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class that reads messages in non-blocking mode. Also contains static functions to speak the torrent proto. NOT SYNCHRONIZABLE!! So dont do it.
